chunk-f1aa38e03a2cdd3122f479f8a521b9a0.description: Beto O'Rourke, also known as Mr. O'Rourke, is a former congressman and the Democratic challenger in the race for governor against the incumbent Greg Abbott. He has raised $27.6 million in the last filing, outpacing Mr. Abbott.

Greg Abbott, also known as Mr. Abbott, is the current governor of Texas and a two-term incumbent. He is competing against Beto O'Rourke in the race for governor and has raised $24.9 million in the last filing.

The Kansas State Constitution is subject to an amendment vote that could remove protections of abortion rights, as part of the Kansas Election following the Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade.

The Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade has focused energy on the abortion issue, particularly impacting Kansas, and has led to the Kansas Election being the first test of Americans' attitudes on abortion rights.

chunk-e9e3e5db7c871eceddadfa7b878a4638.description: Apple is a big tech company seeking more viewers for its streaming services and competing for rights to broadcast games from sports leagues, including the N.F.L.
source_entities: BIG TECH WANTS IN THE GAME

chunk-e9e3e5db7c871eceddadfa7b878a4638.description: Amazon is a big tech company seeking more viewers for its streaming services and competing for rights to broadcast games from sports leagues, including the N.F.L.
source_entities: BIG TECH WANTS IN THE GAME

chunk-e9e3e5db7c871eceddadfa7b878a4638.description: Jonas Vingegaard is a 25-year-old cyclist who won the Tour de France in only his second time riding cycling's most prestigious race, as covered in the SPORTS D1-6 section.
source_entities: A SUDDEN ASCENT TO THE TOP

chunk-e9e3e5db7c871eceddadfa7b878a4638.description: Meryl Streep is a fine actress, known for her use of eyewear in her performances, as analyzed in the ARTS C1-6 section.
The University of Strasbourg is an educational institution that experienced a takeover during World War II, shedding light on a dark period, as reported in the INTERNATIONAL A4-11 section.
The University of Utah acknowledged missteps in its response to concerns about a student's death, as covered in the NATIONAL A12-17, 20 section.
Carleton Varney was a designer known as Mr. Color, trained by decorator Dorothy Draper, and had an aversion to the bland and beige; he was 85 years old, as mentioned in the OBITUARIES D7-8 section.
No More Pet Store Puppies is a bill that prohibits the sale of dogs, cats, and rabbits in New York shops, awaiting the governor's decision, as covered in the NATIONAL A12-17, 20 section.
